meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Christina Rodriguez Andy Hermann Bill Hawkins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6593.

td.p: Christina Rodriguez, a claims processor from Carterville, Illinois
Andy Hermann, a website producer from Los Angeles, California
Bill Hawkins, a hotel concierge from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,400)

tr.td: RADIO, RADIO
ALL IN THE FAMILY
TERMS WITH GREEK LETTERS
HERE'S THE BEGINNING
THE MIDDLE IS "OK"
(Alex: Those two letters--"O-K"--will come up in the middle of each correct response.)
BUT THE END IS ROUGH

Andy
Christina
EUROPEAN LAKES
WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?

NOT BY SHAKESPEARE
ALL SCIENCE "E"
